game.name: 后室迷失之境Backrooms：The Lost
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Captions available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A [Puzzle game] + [escape room] backrooms game;You are FBI agent Tommy.Unfortunately, he fell into the back room during a disappearance case.Random mazes, physical dangers, and the pressure of liminal spaces,Can you escape safely?
game.shortDescriptionEn: A [Puzzle game] + [escape room] backrooms game;You are FBI agent Tommy.Unfortunately, he fell into the back room during a disappearance case.Random mazes, physical dangers, and the pressure of liminal spaces,Can you escape safely?
